```{r}
library(ggplot2)
data = read.csv("C:/Users/asd11/OneDrive/文件/GitHub/111-1-econDV/Covid.csv")
```


```{r}
mean(data$Total)
```


```{r}
ggplot(data, aes(x = 月份 ,y = Total)) + 
geom_line(size=1) + 
geom_hline(aes(yintercept = mean(Total)),size=1) + 
ggtitle("Covid") +
theme(legend.position = "none")
```
